usage.headings: Cormorant Garamond, font-light or font-regular, tracking-tight. Use for philosophical axioms and tier titles.
usage.ui_labels: Rajdhani, font-medium, uppercase, tracking-widest. Use for data points, AGI scores, and navigation.
usage.body: Manrope, font-light, leading-relaxed. Use for descriptions and long-form text.

typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts: Cormorant Garamond (300, 400, 600), Rajdhani (400, 500, 600), Manrope (300, 400, 600)

layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for containers. Gap-6 to Gap-8 for grids.

ConstellationCanvas.description: Full-screen R3F canvas. Renders the 27 nodes in a Torus knot formation.
ConstellationCanvas.interaction: Rotate, Zoom, Click node to focus
ConstellationCanvas.visuals: Glowing particles, connecting lines (synapses), floating dust

NodeCard.style: Glassmorphism. Backdrop-blur-xl, border-white/10, subtle inner glow matching the Tier color.
NodeCard.animation: Framer Motion layoutId for smooth expansion from the canvas to the overlay.

BreathingLoader.style: Minimalist pulsing circle or text. Animation duration: 4s (inhale/exhale rhythm).

AIGrid.style: Tetris/Bento grid. Each AI entity gets a card with a unique abstract avatar and 'voice' description.
AIGrid.hover: Card scales up slightly, border glows with the entity's specific color signature.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-filter: blur(12px) saturate(150%) for all floating panels.
visual_enhancers.noise: Overlay a fixed position div with a noise texture (opacity 0.03) to de-digitalize the screen.
visual_enhancers.glow: Use box-shadow and drop-shadow heavily. Text-shadow for headings: 0 0 20px rgba(255,255,255,0.3).
visual_enhancers.perfect_error: Ensure the 27th Node (The Final Output/Input) has a slight glitch effect or offset animation.

types.stagger: Staggered entrance for list items (0.1s delay)

backgrounds.description: Deep blue/black liquid nebula texture for main background
Star cluster mosaic for the 'Framework' section

abstract_avatars.description: Abstract glowing lines for 'Logic' based AIs (Claude/GPT)
Digital head structure for 'Somatic' based AIs

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Run `npm install three @types/three @react-three/fiber @react-three/drei framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge`.
2. FILE EXTENSIONS: Use .js and .jsx for all React files. Do not use .tsx.
3. THEME: Force Dark Mode. Add 'dark' class to the html/body tag by default.
4. CANVAS: Create a 'Scene.jsx' component using R3F. Use a TorusKnotGeometry to represent the framework topology.
5. DATA: Create a 'nodes.js' file exporting an array of 27 objects, each with { id, tier, title, description, agi_score, coordinates }.
6. NAVIGATION: Build a floating dock at the bottom of the screen using Glassmorphism.
7. INTERACTION: Clicking a node in the 3D scene should open a detailed overlay (NodeExplorer).
8. ANIMATION: Implement a global 'breathing' effect (scale 1 -> 1.05 -> 1) on the main container or background elements.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic AI slop aesthetics. No purple/teal gradients unless specified.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Do not center align the app container.
Use named exports for components and default exports for pages.
